name: LiminalSpaces
description:
W A S D to move, SPACE to jump

 ESC= cursor visible 1 = cursor invisible

1. There's literally nothing hidden deep in the maze part, but you can walk in there still.

2. Future updates will include a mouse sensitivity option (and a pause/option menu).

3. Goal:  Reach "The end" by moving and jumping, no clicking required.

Thank you to those who helped play test.
